verses.verse: Israel<WH3478> is a luxuriant<WH9061> vine;<WH1612> He produces<WH7737> fruit<WH6529> for himself. The more<WH7230> his fruit,<WH6529> The more<WH7235> altars<WH4196> he made;<WH7235> The richer<WH9185> his land,<WH776> The better<WH3190> he made<WH3190> the [sacred] pillars.<WH4676>

Their heart<WH3820> is faithless;<WH9140> Now<WH6258> they must bear<WH816> their guilt.<WH816> The Lord will break<WH6202> down<WH6202> their altars<WH4196> [And] destroy<WH7703> their [sacred] pillars.<WH4676>

Surely<WH3588> now<WH6258> they will say,<WH559> "We have<WH369> no<WH369> king,<WH4428> For we do not revere<WH3372> the Lord.<WH3068> As for the king,<WH4428> what<WH4100> can he do<WH6213> for us?"

They speak<WH1696> [mere] words,<WH1697> With worthless<WH7723> oaths<WH422> they make<WH3772> covenants;<WH1285> And judgment<WH4941> sprouts<WH6524> like poisonous<WH7219> weeds<WH7219> in the furrows<WH8525> of the field.<WH9583>

The inhabitants<WH7934> of Samaria<WH8111> will fear<WH9076> For the calf<WH5697> of Beth-aven. Indeed,<WH3588> its people<WH5971> will mourn<WH56> for it, And its idolatrous<WH3649> priests<WH3649> will cry<WH1523> out over<WH5921> it, Over<WH5921> its glory,<WH9202> since<WH3588> it has departed<WH1540> from it.

The thing itself<WH1571> will be carried<WH2986> to Assyria<WH804> As tribute<WH4503> to King<WH4428> Jareb;<WH3377> Ephraim<WH669> will be seized<WH3947> with shame,<WH1317> And Israel<WH3478> will be ashamed<WH954> of its own counsel.<WH6098>
Samaria<WH8111> will be cut<WH1820> off<WH1820> [with] her king,<WH4428> Like a stick<WH9526> on the surface<WH6440> of the water.<WH4325>

Also the high<WH1116> places<WH1116> of Aven,<WH206> the sin<WH2398> of Israel,<WH3478> will be destroyed;<WH8045> Thorn<WH6975> and thistle<WH1863> will grow<WH5927> on their altars,<WH4196> Then they will say<WH559> to the mountains,<WH2022> "Cover<WH3680> us!" And to the hills,<WH1389> "Fall<WH5307> on us!"

From the days<WH3117> of Gibeah<WH1390> you have sinned,<WH2398> O Israel;<WH3478> There<WH8033> they stand!<WH5975> Will not the battle<WH4421> against<WH5921> the sons<WH1121> of iniquity<WH9390> overtake<WH5381> them in Gibeah<WH1390>?
When it is My desire,<WH185> I will chastise<WH3256> them; And the peoples<WH5971> will be gathered<WH622> against<WH5921> them When they are bound<WH631> for their double<WH8147> guilt.<WH9392>

And Ephraim<WH669> is a trained<WH3925> heifer<WH5697> that loves<WH157> to thresh,<WH1758> But I will come<WH5674> over<WH5921> her fair<WH2898> neck<WH6677> [with a yoke]; I will harness<WH7392> Ephraim,<WH669> Judah<WH3063> will plow,<WH9177> Jacob<WH3290> will harrow<WH7702> for himself.

Sow<WH2232> with a view to righteousness,<WH6666> Reap<WH7114> in accordance<WH6310> with kindness;<WH2617> Break<WH5214> up your fallow<WH5215> ground,<WH5215> For it is time<WH6256> to seek<WH1875> the Lord<WH3068> Until<WH5704> He comes<WH935> to rain<WH3384> righteousness<WH6664> on you.

You have plowed<WH9177> wickedness,<WH7562> you have reaped<WH7114> injustice,<WH9390> You have eaten<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of lies.<WH3585> Because<WH3588> you have trusted<WH982> in your way,<WH1870> in your numerous<WH7230> warriors,<WH1368>

Therefore, a tumult<WH7588> will arise<WH6965> among your people,<WH5971> And all<WH3605> your fortresses<WH4013> will be destroyed,<WH7703> As Shalman<WH8020> destroyed<WH7701> Beth-arbel on the day<WH3117> of battle,<WH4421> [When] mothers<WH517> were dashed<WH7376> in pieces<WH7376> with [their] children.<WH1121>

Thus<WH3602> it will be done<WH6213> to you at Bethel<WH1008> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of your great<WH9567> wickedness.<WH9567> At dawn<WH7837> the king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> will be completely<WH1820> cut<WH1820> off.<WH1820>
